snippet: The Long Island University super fan Richard Kurlander, who has been blind since birth, never misses a Blackbirds game, either in person or on the radio or Internet.
abstract: Profile of Richard Kurlander, Long Island University super fan who has been blind since birth; Kurlander never misses an LIU game, either in person or on the radio or Internet; is excited for team's NCAA men's basketball tournament appearance.
lead_paragraph: The Long Island University super fan Richard Kurlander, who has been blind since birth, never misses a Blackbirds game, either in person or on the radio or Internet.

headline.seo: No. 16 L.I.U. Has a Super Fan in Its Corner
headline.main: Nothing Sweeter Than the Sound of a Bouncing Ball
headline.print_headline: Nothing Sweeter Than the Sound of a Bouncing Ball
